Don't fret its part ofyour nature to be negative Frank. I do use normalhuma=
n speech in my evpmaker, a while ago Misty and I made a couple recordings f=
or it. Just thinking outside the box Frank!`Trying something different.... =

=C2=A0
You would think experimentation was obscene or something. LOL Loose=
n up Frank, I'm not some pup newbie!
=C2=A0
Frank R.

=C2=A0I don't mean to be neagative, but why is it that almost no one wi=

ow the programmer's instructions. I know everyone wants to experiment, but =
here's no need to contiusously re-invent EVPmaker. 
=C2=A0

You know, on a w=
him I took the latest version of EVPMaker and loaded a mix of Stefan's 20% =
slowed down allophone file and the original 13 tones of Spiricom. I transmi=
tted that raw sound from a modified handheld "walkie talkie" and received o=
n a modified "walkie talkie" of the same type and set to the same frequency=
. I got some interesting results!
=C2=A0
Frank R

aliengirl@gmail. com> wro=
te:


From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-I=
TC] EVP Maker
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Date: Wednesday, April 8, 2009, =
1:27 PM





=C2=A0EVPmaker supplies the raw audio the enities use to from =
their voices. Raw audio methods seem to produce clearer, and more consisten=
t messages. The spritis and other entites seem to need bit of human speech =
and other noise to make their voices. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Frank-S

Hi April,

The lastest version of EVP maker allows you =
to capture EVP's directly to your laptop through a microphone attached to t=
he Mic input on your laptop. I got mine from http://www.giveaway oftheday. =
com.=C2=A0 They give away a different software everyday.=C2=A0 They have a =
section for freeware that you can pickup any time.


Regards,
Jon in Texas

LOL!!!
=C2=A0
You know, I used to have on my computer little program that I=
 downloaded called "EVP Maker". I wonder if that is the same EVP maker you =
mentioned on this site. Unfortunately I lost it when I had to reformat my m=
achine, and could not find the link to the original download. I believe I f=
ound the original link from the "Shadowlands" website, if I remember correc=
tly.
=C2=A0
Besides that, this was YEARS ago, and I really did not understa=
nd how to use it, or even what it was for.
=C2=A0
